title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. 

(a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 
(Amendment) and Variation of Days and Hours (Cavan and 
Virginia) Order 2022. 

(b) This Order shall come into operation on 1st January 2023.
text_norm: 1 (a) order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day hour (cavan virginia) order 2022 (b) order shall come operation 1st january 2023

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5 

of 1961), is hereby amended by – 

(a) The deletion at reference number 14 of the matter in columns 

(2), (3), (4) and (5) and 

(b) 

the substitution at reference number 10 for the matter in 
columns (3), (4) and (5) of the following: 

“District 
Court 
Area of 
Cavan 

Cavan – 

First, Second, 
and Fourth 
Tuesday in 
each month. 
First, Second, 
Third and 
Fourth 
Thursday in 
each month. 

Second and 
Third Friday 
in each Month 

Virginia – 

First Friday in 
each month. 

The area comprising the Electoral Divisions of 
Ardue, Arvagh, Ashfield, Bailieborough, 
Ballintemple, Ballyconnell, Ballyhaise, 
Ballyjamesduff, Ballymachugh, Ballymagauran, 
Bawnboy, Bellananagh, Belturbet Urban, Benbrack, 
Bilberry, Bruce Hall, Butler’s Bridge, Canningstown, 
Carn, Carnagarve, Carrafin, Castlerahan, 
Castlesaunderson, Cavan Rural, Cavan Urban, 
Clonervy, Cootehill Rural, Cootehill Urban, Corr, 
Corraneary, Crossbane, Crossdowney, Crosskeys, 
Cuttragh, Denn, Derrin, Derrylahan, Derrynananta, 
Diamond, Doogary, Dowra, Drumanespick, 
Drumcarhan, Drumcarn, Drumlumman, Drung, 
Dunmakeever, Enniskeen, Esky, Graddum, Grilly, 
Kilbride, Kilcogy, Kilconny, Kilgolagh, Kill, 
Killeshandra, Killinagh, Killinkere, Killykeen, 
Kilnaleck, Kinawley, Kingscourt, Knappagh, Larah 
North, Larah South, Lisagoan, Lissanover, 
Loughdawan, Lurgan, Milltown, Moynehall, 
Mullagh, Munterconnaught, Pedara Vohers, 
Rakenny, Redhill, Scrabby, Shercock, Skeagh, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 22nd November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [583] 3 

All sittings at

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not
text_raw:
4. Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [583] 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service 
 14 November 2022 

PAUL KELLY, 
 Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to sign 

documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

MAURA HOWE, 
 Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 

authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to section 
10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [583] 5

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (This note does not form part of the instrument and is not a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note does not form part of the instrument and is not a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the abolition of the District Court Area of Virginia and 
the creation of a new District Court Area within District No. 5 to consist of the 
territorial area formerly constituting the District Court area of Virginia and the 
territorial area formerly constituting the District Court Area of Cavan, the new 
District Court Area is to be known as the District Court area of Cavan. 

 
 
 
 
 
 6 [583]
